synopsis.text: Korean drama "Autumn in My Heart" follows the poignant journey of Yu-Jin, a young girl who falls head over heels for Joon-sang. After a tragic accident robs her of her first love, she decides to marry her childhood companion, Sang-hyuk. Just as they are about to announce their engagement, Min-hyung enters the scene, bearing a striking resemblance to Joon-sang. Torn between her past love and loyalty to her friend, Yu-Jin finds herself in a heart-wrenching dilemma. This emotional rollercoaster features 23 members of the original Korean cast, with Japanese subtitles available for viewers. The prequel is graced by Tom Komikeu's captivating ending song, adding an extra layer of depth to this touching tale.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
